pageContext.claim: “On perhaps no issue have these district court injunctions been more brazen and damaging than in the area of immigration. In case after case, judges are prohibiting us from enforcing the plain letter of the law.”
pageContext.analysis: Trump claims that courts have prevented him from enforcing immigration laws. Many of the nationwide injunctions Trump complains about are based on what judges have found to be his administration's violations of immigrants' rights under law.
